{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"これまで使用していたコントロールは、任意の変数に代入した後、","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"page.add","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"で画面に追加していました。","href":null}]}

```python
# これまでのコントロール
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):
		# 任意の変数にコントロールを代入
		text = ft.Text(value="サンプル")

		# page.addする
    page.add(text)

ft.app(target=main)
```

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"以下のコードを見てみてください⇩","href":null}]}

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):
		# page.appbarにft.Appbarを代入
    **page.appbar = ft.AppBar(
        leading=ft.Icon(ft.icons.APPLE),
        title=ft.Text(value="アプリ名"),
        actions=[
            ft.IconButton(icon=ft.icons.MENU)
        ],
        bgcolor=ft.colors.GREEN
    )**

    text = ft.Text(value="AppBarのサンプル")

    page.add(text)

ft.app(target=main)
```

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"AppBarの","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"title","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"プロパティに","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"ft.Text","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"コントロールを渡すと、AppBarに好きな文字列を表示させることができます。","href":null}]}
{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"アプリの名前などを表示すると良いでしょう。","href":null}]}

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):
    page.appbar = ft.AppBar(
        **title=ft.Text(value="アプリ名"),**
        bgcolor=ft.colors.BLACK12
    )

    text = ft.Text(value="AppBarのタイトルのサンプル")

    page.add(text)

ft.app(target=main)
```

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"title","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"プロパティに渡すのは","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"ft.Text","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"コントロールなので、サイズやフォント、色を好きにカスタマイズできます。","href":null}]}

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):
    page.fonts = {
        "Jacquarda" : "/fonts/JacquardaBastarda9-Regular.ttf"
    }

    page.appbar = ft.AppBar(
        title=**ft.Text(
            value="Applicarion Name",
            color=ft.colors.CYAN,
            size=35,
            font_family="Jacquarda"
        )**,
        bgcolor=ft.colors.BLUE_GREY_50
    )

    text = ft.Text(value="AppBarのタイトルのサンプル") 

    page.add(text)

ft.app(target=main)
```

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):

    page.appbar = ft.AppBar(
        title=ft.Text(value="Applicarion Name"),
        # タイトルを中央寄せ
        **center_title=True**,
        bgcolor=ft.colors.BLUE_GREY_50
    )

    text = ft.Text(value="AppBarのタイトルのサンプル") 

    page.add(text)

ft.app(target=main)
```

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):

    page.appbar = ft.AppBar(
		    # 左端に配置するアイコン
        **leading=ft.Icon(ft.icons.TIPS_AND_UPDATES),**
        bgcolor=ft.colors.BLUE_GREY_50
    )

    text = ft.Text(value="AppBarのアイコンのサンプル")  # valueを省略

    page.add(text)

ft.app(target=main)
```

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):

    page.appbar = ft.AppBar(
        title=ft.Text(value="Horizon"),
        leading=ft.Container(
            content=ft.Image(
                src="/horizon_icon.png",
            ),
            padding=10
        ),
        toolbar_height=70,
        leading_width=70,
        bgcolor=ft.colors.BLUE_GREY_50
    )

    text = ft.Text(value="AppBarのアイコンのサンプル")  # valueを省略

    page.add(text)

ft.app(target=main)
```

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"このボタンは、","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"antions","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"プロパティにリスト形式で複数の","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"ft.IconButtons","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"を与えることで設定します。","href":null}]}

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):

    page.appbar = ft.AppBar(
        actions=[
            ft.IconButton(ft.icons.MESSAGE),
            ft.IconButton(ft.icons.CALENDAR_MONTH),
            ft.IconButton(ft.icons.SETTINGS)
        ],
        bgcolor=ft.colors.BLUE_GREY_50
    )

    text = ft.Text(value="AppBarの固定ボタンのサンプル")  # valueを省略

    page.add(text)

ft.app(target=main)
```
